external_games.name: Ice Queen Wedding Salon: Frost Bridal Game
Ice Queen Wedding Salon: Frost Bridal Game

name: Ice Queen Wedding Salon: Frost Bridal Game
summary:
This is the fully unlocked version and it does not have advertisements! 

One year has passed since the ice princess was crowned Snow Queen, and now she is getting married to the frost prince! 
Since you are her favorite stylist, she has come to your salon to get ready for her big day. She knows the best dresses, shoes, jewelry and makeup are all offered at your salon! 
The kingdom has high expectations for the Snow Queen bride, so you need to make her majesty look as beautiful as can be! Pick the best bridal look and don't let them down! 

Features: 
* Dress up three different Snow Queens in fun winter time bridal fashions 
* All 3 of your favorite salon stages are here: spa, makeup and dress up 
* Plentiful cosmetics and dress up items to bring out a perfect Snow Queen bride 

Remember to take pictures of the Snow Queen and her groom on their special day! Share the photos with friends and family. Happy Frost Wedding Day!
